articles.title: UltraTech announces ₹32,400 crore capex for expansion in the next three years | Mint - Mint
articles.description: The cement company also announced the commissioning of two new greenfield projects with a total capacity of 5.4 million tonnes a year in an exchange filing.
articles.content: New Delhi: UltraTech Cement, an Aditya Birla Group company, announced it has earmarked 32,400 crore for capital expenditure (capex) over the next three years as part of its expansion plans. The compa… [+6734 chars]

articles.title: Bharat Biotech, SII arm Bilthoven Biologicals join hands for global polio eradication - The Times of India
articles.description: India Business News: HYDERABAD: Vaccine maker Bharat Biotech has joined hands with Serum Institute of India’s (SII) wholly-owned Dutch subsidiary Bilthoven Biologicals BV .

articles.title: Diabetes patients to be offered artificial-pancreas technology - BBC.com
articles.description: The rollout of new devices for thousands in England with type 1 diabetes is hailed as a landmark moment.

articles.title: Why Northern Lights viewing is about to get more magical - BBC.com
articles.description: There are many myths surrounding the aurora but satellite technology provides insights into the celestial marvel.
